page.title: 08Clubs in Twyford & Poundon
page.content: Twyford has a wide range of organisations.The Village Hall is used for meetings of the Women's Institute,Mother & Toddler Group,Keep Fit classes and a Country Dancing Team.Twyford Amateur Dramatics Group have entertained the village to several pantomimes and Christmas entertainments.The recreation ground is meeting place for the Cricket Club,whilst the Crown Public House organise a gun club and Pool and Darts teams.The Crown 65 Club provide Outings and Christmas gifts for the village pensioners.At the church musical villagers join in Bell-ringing,Hand-bells and Choral singing.At the United Reformed Church are a Women's Guild,Sunday School & Brownie meetings. At Poundon the Community Association provides Outings,Christmas dinners etc.
